[[Version 2.1]]
* Fixes an issue whereby the [[Fatui Skirmisher - Hydrogunner Legionnaire]] could not heal the [[Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage]] and the [[Mirror Maiden]].
----
[[Version 1.4]]
* Fixes an issue whereby the blocking effect of [[Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard]]s may incorrectly remain.
----
[[Version 1.3]]
* Fixes an issue in Co-Op Mode whereby the blocking effect of [[Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard]]s may not be displayed properly.
----
[[Version 1.2]]
* [[Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard]]'s Geo counter mechanic was removed as it was an addition made in error to the [[Swirl]] like counter shield.
----
[[Version 1.1]]
* '''November 11, 2020''' &mdash; Fixes an issue with [[Cryo Whopperflower]], [[Pyro Whopperflower]], [[Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer]], and [[Fatui Skirmisher - Geochanter Bracer]] whereby in situations where they should normally take fall DMG, they may not take fall DMG as expected.
